Adult (Aleutian).description: Cackling Geese are smaller with a smaller bill and a shorter neck than Canada Goose. Cackling Geese also have a blockier head and steeper forehead than Canada Geese.

Adult (minima).description: Cackling Geese tend to be smaller overall than Canada Geese with a smaller bill and shorter neck, but there is some overlap as some Canada Geese can be quite small. Some Cackling Geese have a darker breast as shown here.

Adult (Richardson's).description: Cackling Geese have a smaller bill and shorter neck than Canada Geese, but beware of smaller bodied Canada Geese and Canada Geese with the their necks drawn in giving them a short-necked appearance.

Adult (Atlantic).description: Brant lack the white chin strap of Canada Goose and have smaller bill.

Adult.description: Greater White-fronted Geese have a brown (not black) neck, a pink (not black) bill, and orange (not black) legs.

Adult blue morph.description: Blue morph Snow Geese have a white (not black) neck and pink (not black) legs.
